tests.name: Hangperson game over because the word is guessed [5 points]

Hangperson guessing should treat guesses as case insensitive [5 points]
Hangperson guessing repeats should not count as wrong when correct [5 points]
Hangperson guessing repeats should not uble count a repeated wrong guess [5 points]
Hangperson guessing repeats should not count a repeated wrong guess towards losing [5 points]
Hangperson guessing repeats should display an error message [5 points]
Hangperson invalid guess should label a non-letter as invalid [5 points]
Hangperson invalid guess should label a blank form as invalid [5 points]
Hangperson starting a new game should take me to the show page [5 points]
Hangperson cheating should not be able to fake a win [5 points]
Hangperson cheating should not be able to fake a loss [5 points]
